Item ID20128

The hood of darkness is obtained as a possible reward from master Treasure Trails. It is part of the robes of darkness set, and requires 40 Magic and 20 Defence to wear. The hood and other robes of darkness set pieces can be stored in the costume room.

The design of the hood suggest allegiance to Zaros.

[[File:Hood of darkness detail.png|left|110px]]
[[File:Hood of darkness chathead.png|left]]
The '''hood of darkness''' is obtained as a possible reward from [[Clue scroll (master)|master]] [[Treasure Trails]]. It is part of the [[robes of darkness]] set, and requires 40 [[Magic]] and 20 [[Defence]] to wear. The hood and other robes of darkness set pieces can be stored in the [[costume room]].

The design of the hood suggest allegiance to [[Zaros]].
